summary: Utility module that assists in embedding modular pipelines into a master Kedro pipeline. It provides functions for copying nodes, prefixing and renaming datasets and parameters, handling transcoding separators, mapping dataset and parameter names, and validating that required datasets exist. A custom exception signals integration errors.
business_intent: Allow developers to compose reusable, namespaced pipeline fragments into a single cohesive pipeline, ensuring correct dataset and parameter wiring while preventing integration mistakes.
